attributes.action: Best of British & Pakistani culture to be celebrated at the Palace in 2017.
attributes.additional_details: The British Pakistani community should be given the equal opportunity, to celebrate at Buckingham Palace “The Best of British and Pakistani culture,” as it is also the year of Pakistan’s 70th independence anniversary, just as India. The Queen is not only the Queen of a particular British ethnic minority, but Queen of all British ethnic community equally.
attributes.background: The Queen hosted “The Best of British and Indian Culture” at Buckingham Palace on the 26/2/2017.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the Queen, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to advise Her Majesty to hold an event of this kind.
